50#ifndef UART_STREAM_COMMON_H
51#define UART_STREAM_COMMON_H
52
53#include "am_bsp.h"
54#include "uart_example_timer_control.h"
55
56#define UART_BAUDRATE 115200
57//#define UART_BAUDRATE 3000000
58#define TX_DMA_BUFFER_SIZE (1024*8)
59#define RX_DMA_BUFFER_SIZE (1024*8)
60#define MAX_RX_DATA_BUFFER_SIZE RX_DMA_BUFFER_SIZE
61#define MAX_TX_DATA_BUFFER_SIZE TX_DMA_BUFFER_SIZE
62
63#define RX_BUFF_THRESHOLD 256
64
65#define NUM_UARTS_USED 1
66
67#if defined(AM_BSP_GPIO_UART0_TX) && defined(AM_BSP_GPIO_UART0_RX)
68#define UART0_AVAIL 1
69#else
70#define UART0_AVAIL 0
71#endif
72#if defined(AM_BSP_GPIO_UART1_TX) && defined(AM_BSP_GPIO_UART1_RX)
73#define UART1_AVAIL 1
74#else
75#define UART1_AVAIL 0
76#endif
77#if defined(AM_BSP_GPIO_UART2_TX) && defined(AM_BSP_GPIO_UART2_RX)
78#define UART2_AVAIL 1
79#else
80#define UART2_AVAIL 0
81#endif
82#if defined(AM_BSP_GPIO_UART3_TX) && defined(AM_BSP_GPIO_UART3_RX)
83#define UART3_AVAIL 1
84#else
85#define UART3_AVAIL 0
86#endif
87
88//
91//
92typedef enum
93{
94#if UART0_AVAIL
95 eUART0,
96#endif
97#if UART1_AVAIL
98 eUART1,
99#endif
100#if UART2_AVAIL
101 eUART2,
102#endif
103#if UART3_AVAIL
104 eUART3,
105#endif
106 eMAX_UARTS,
107 euidX32 = 0x70000000, // force this to 32bit value on all compilers
108}
109uart_id_e;
110
111#if defined(AM_BSP_UART_STREAM_UART)
112#define UART_ID (AM_BSP_UART_STREAM_UART)
113#else
114#warning "AM_BSP_UART_STREAM_UART not defined in BSP, defaulting to UART2 if available"
115#if defined(UART2_AVAIL) && UART2_AVAIL
116#define UART_ID (2)
117#else
118#define UART_ID (0)
119#endif
120#endif

135}
